lines.text:
[watching a parade of troops march by]
Okay, boys, we've seen enough. Come on.
Why? Where're we going?
We're gonna clean up on some Japs.

[ready to let the boys go but pointing to the vegetables stolen by Muggs]
All right, only put that stuff back where you got it.
That's Vitamins for Victory.
You wanna join the Navy? What for?
We wanna share the ocean with Japan.
You wanna do *what*?
We wanna share the ocean with Japan.
What do you mean "with Japan?"
We'll take the top and give them the bottom.
Something smells.
Yeah, and it ain't cherry blossoms.
Whatever it is, we're gonna find out.
You're sorta J.G., huh? Junior G-Men?
Hey, now there's an idea. They won't let us enlist, so maybe we can help out like that.
Good morning, Matsui. How's your health?
Very good. I trust that your honorable health is excellent, young man.
My health is slowly depreciating, and I'm very dishonorable, but I want to thank my venerable forefathers that I'm able and well to walk into your worthy tea shop on this sunny day.
[the East Side Kids discover the Black Dragon uniforms]
Maybe they're just a bunch of actors rehearsing a play or something.
Naw, I think it's Japanese Halloween.
We wanna learn Yokohama to yodel the Star Spangled Banner.
You'll have to have proof of your age.
Proof? Feel these bristles.
[rubs his chin on the back of the officer's hand]
And I just shaved this mornin', too.
Democracies, they won't be here much longer.
You're a very brave young fellow with all your friends here.
Yeah, go ahead. Step outside, fellas. I wanna take care of this.
Oh, no. I don't a wanna fight.
Naw, not unless you've got ten to one on your side.
You talk like you was a General MacArthur.
Bataan or Japan, that General will fight 'em to a stand still.
Yeah, you're not kidding. So long as he's got help.
He'll have plenty of help because we're joinin' the army.
That toad from Tokyo, he can't do that to me. I'll murder him!
Say, you guys sure this is Kino's store?
Sure, can't you smell the cherry scent?
The only thing I ever did with a cent is spend it.
All in one place?
You gotta believe us.
Eh, he wouldn't even believe Ripley.
What did I do now? You said you wanted to make a pyramid.
You'll never make it, ya bunch of...
Well, I'm not an Egyptian!

[knocks a spy unconscious]
You're one Risin' Sun that's not gonna rise.
Seize those men!
Not if I sees you first!
Uh-oh, there goes Little Red Riding Hood. A beautiful piece of Hari-Kiri.
What do you mean Hari-Kiri? He committed suicide.
The Japs don't ask you how old you are when they start droppin' those bombs on ya.
Orders is orders. Tell that to the Marines.
[last lines]
Awe, don't feel bad. We'll take you on your honeymoon. Come on, let's go! See you in Tokyo, Papa!
I may be a Junior G, but I'm also an SBB.
What is an SBB?
A scared black boy!

[at the top of a dark staircase after Muggs bribes him with a reward of loaded dice to be their point man]
No, I ain't going down there first.
Not even for the dice?
Not even for fried chicken.

[after his mother throws them out for catching her stove on fire]
Now look, fellas, don't mind my mother. She gets nervous over nuttin'.
That's the most moiderous interpretation of music *I* ever heard.
Can't you ever learn no ethics?
Aw, can I help it if I'm touched?
Man, we is in here, but we still ain't no where.
